import re

def extract_numbers(string):
    numbers = re.findall('', string)
    numbers = [float(number) if '.' in number else int(number) for number in numbers]
    return numbers

import re

def extract_numbers(string):
    numbers = re.findall('[-+]?\\d*\\.\\d+|[-+]?\\d+', string)
    numbers = [float(number) if '.' not in number else int(number) for number in numbers]
    return numbers

mutants.original_line: numbers = [float(number) if '.' in number else int(number) for number in numbers]
mutants.mutated_line: numbers = [float(number) if '' in number else int(number) for number in numbers]
mutants.code:
import re

def extract_numbers(string):
    numbers = re.findall('[-+]?\\d*\\.\\d+|[-+]?\\d+', string)
    numbers = [float(number) if '' in number else int(number) for number in numbers]
    return numbers
